Cell.Data: The DEV TEAM / MISC NOTES column contains info on what text between { } signs means (if applicable). It usually stands for either a numeric value, or a numeric value with an icon. Text between [ ] signs stands for a certain type of icon.
Nossos videntes nos alertaram sobre uma turba se aproximando de nossas fronteiras, {STR_leaderName} da {STR_playerRace}. Não confunda a falta de agressão com tolerância. Qual é o seu propósito aqui?

Note that all the texts in this document that refer to two people - the speaker and the one spoken too - that can both be male or female.
Note that use of the 'localized' and 'alternative localized string' only applies for the gender of the speaker.
If the gender of the person spoken to requires inflection, please try to translate the text in a way that doesn't require such inflection. If this is impossible, please get in touch with us informing us of which lines this concerns and how they would be inflected in the language you are translating too.
This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Sabíamos que arruaceiros iriam macular nossas terras nesta época. Como explica sua presença aqui?

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Permaneça em seu setor {STR_leaderName}, ou nos prepararemos para que nossos Paladinos façam justiça. Declare suas intenções ou testemunhe a majestade de nossos trajes de batalha.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
{STR_leaderName}, vemos que está invadindo nossas fronteiras. Seria sensato reconhecer nossa causa nesta região e manter distância.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
É compreensível a curiosidade por nossas grandes cidades, {STR_leaderName}, mas considere as consequências de cada movimento que fizer aqui. Veio para jurar lealdade?

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Os Paladinos vigiam nossas fronteiras há gerações, protegendo-nos dos problemas além de nosso domínio. Você é um agente do caos?

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Reivindicamos este mundo em nome dos Oathbound, {STR_leaderName}. Considere isto um aviso cortês. Nosso povo é leal, nossos Paladinos fervorosos e justos. Não manche nosso povo com más intenções.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Contemple a majestade dos Oathbound. Damos as boas-vindas a nossas fronteiras. Nossos Cavaleiros estão em posição de descanso no momento; deseja falar com os Videntes?

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Contemple a majestade dos Oathbound. Damos as boas-vindas a nossas fronteiras. Nossos Paladinos estão em posição de descanso no momento; deseja falar com os Videntes?

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Tanto potencial desperdiçado... você está levando seus {STR_PlayerRace} pelo caminho errado. Que negócios tem com os Oathbound?

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Existem infinitas possibilidades para nosso relacionamento, {STR_LeaderName}, então considere o potencial de suas palavras.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Estamos abertos à comunicação, {STR_LeaderName}. O que o motiva a entrar em contato conosco?
Os Videntes reconhecem sua oferta de comércio.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Solicita bens refinados dos Oathbound? Parece que não trouxe nada além de bugigangas para vender.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Saudações a você, nosso mais estimado contato, honorável {STR_leaderName}. Os Oathbound estão abertos ao comércio.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Seu império não passa de uma perturbação anômala na ordem que mantemos. Reconcilie-se com seu criador, {STR_LeaderName}. Eliminaremos a impureza de sua espécie.

{STR_reasons} is a list of reasons, written like "You trespassed" and can be found in this excel sheet. This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
{STR_reasons}.[br/]Nossos Paladinos preparam seus trajes de batalha, nossos Videntes guiarão sua missão. Você será purificado desta terra e esquecido, {STR_LeaderName}.

{STR_reasons} is a list of reasons, written like "You trespassed" and can be found in this excel sheet. This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Os Videntes nos alertaram sobre seu grupo de {STR_playerRace}. Ande com cuidado...

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Um agente do caos é um inimigo dos Oathbound.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Os Oathbound já superaram vilões como você antes, e faremos isso novamente.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Você agiu com honra, {STR_leaderName}. Juntos, avançamos rumo aos grandiosos e poderosos futuros que nos aguardam.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Ainda há esperança para você, {STR_leaderName}. Os Videntes falam de um grande potencial em nossa parceria contínua.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Este é um acordo aceitável. Ambos sairemos beneficiados.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Aceitamos seu acordo, mas saiba que já recusamos ofertas melhores que esta.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Você superestima seu valor, {STR_leaderName}. Recusamos sua oferta.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Os Videntes avaliaram o valor de sua oferta. Recusamos.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
